cards.name: Pet Snecko
cards.description:
Draw 1 card.
Randomize the cost of all cards in your hand this turn.

cards.name: Pet Snecko+
cards.description:
Draw 2 cards.
Randomize the cost of all cards in your hand this turn.

relics.name: Birthday Cake of Shame
relics.description: Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by 20. At the start of combat, shuffle a Shame into your draw pile.
relics.flavorText: It's tasty, but you feel only shame from eating it.

relics.name: Creamberry
relics.description: Uncommon and Rare cards in future card rewards are upgraded.
relics.flavorText: A strawberry filled with natural vanilla cream. Delicious!

relics.name: Flamango
relics.description: Whenever you play an Attack, deal 2 damage to ALL enemies at the end of your turn.
relics.flavorText: A mango concentrated with a forgotten firepower. Spicy!

relics.name: Paper Faux
relics.description: Whenever you apply Weak, apply an additional 1 Weak. Whenever you apply Vulnerable, apply an additional 1 Vulnerable.
relics.flavorText: A silent effigy you found in the forest clearing. It seems to be watching you.

relics.name: Par Snip
relics.description: Upon pickup, Upgrade all Basic cards.
relics.flavorText: Definitely more than your average vegetable, despite the name. Rich in vitamins!

relics.name: Shell Peas
relics.description: Whenever you are attacked, gain 2 Temporary_HP.
relics.flavorText: These huge peas actually contain normal-sized peas inside. It has an interesting texture as you chew.

relics.name: Slice of Birthday Cake
relics.description: Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by 5.
relics.flavorText: A nice slice of birthday cake to celebrate.

relics.name: Snecko Autograph
relics.description:
Right click in a shop to activate.
Randomly obtain one of the relics.

relics.name: Spirit Disease
relics.description: The next non-boss chest you open will have its relic replaced with Spirit Poop.
relics.flavorText: A strange plague from drinking strange water... You don't feel too well..

relics.name: Wild Mango
relics.description: Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by 14. Start each combat with Slow.
relics.flavorText: A succulent fruit grown within the spire, not meant to be consumed by the untainted.

relics.name: Wild Pear
relics.description: Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by 10. Start each combat with 1 Slothful.
relics.flavorText: Not even this fruit was spared from the blight.

relics.name: Wild Strawberry
relics.description: Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by 7 and take 14 damage.
relics.flavorText: A delicious fruit tainted ever so slightly by the blight.

potions.name: Antidote
potions.description: Remove all Poison Frail Weakness and Vulnerable and heal for each point removed.

potions.name: Haunted Gourd
potions.description: Discover a Skill Power and Attack which cost 0 this turn. Add a random Curse and Slimed to your hand.

potions.name: Snecko Extract
potions.description: Drink this and something extremely random will happen.

potions.name: Twisted Elixir
potions.description: Make an enemy stronger and gain special rewards based on the size of its health when this is thrown.
